name: André Carson
tweet_text: Thanks to the advocacy of Tia Coleman, who survived the 2018 incident, countless lives will be saved. I want to thank Tia for her tireless advocacy. This multi-year work is dedicated to the Coleman family and all whose lives have been tragically lost in duck boat accidents.

name: André Carson

name: André Carson

tweet_text: To my constituent conductors, engineers, signalmen, boilermakers and more, please know that I will continue to support your efforts to make America’s railways the safest and most efficient in the world.

name: André Carson

name: André Carson
tweet_text: With the success of their employers riding on their shoulders, rail workers should not have to use vacation days for sick leave, as is currently the case. But we must go further.

tweet_text: Last year, the seven major railway companies in the U.S. and Canada made $27 billion in profits. https://t.co/pibirwdl11

name: André Carson
tweet_text: The 2nd bill will ensure rail workers get at least 7 sick days if they need them, which is critical in an industry where more than 100,000 employees have no paid sick days. For the workers who kept the US running throughout the pandemic, it is wrong to withhold paid sick leave.

name: André Carson
tweet_text: With this action, more than 765,000 Americans will be able to keep their jobs ahead of the holiday season. The codification of several long-negotiated aggreements will provide a historic 24% pay raise for rail workers.

name: André Carson
tweet_text: The first bill will prevent a devastating rail shutdown, which would have had a severe impact on our economy and supply chains.

name: André Carson
tweet_text: When the lowest wage workers do better, everyone does better. Raising the minimum wage will help economies grow and communities flourish. Don't tell me we can't afford to raise the minimum wage. We can't afford NOT to.

name: André Carson
tweet_text: An increase in the minimum wage would also be incredibly beneficial to Black and Brown workers, who often feel the greatest brunt of our nation's growing inequality. Raising the minimum wage is a social justice issue.

name: André Carson

name: André Carson
tweet_text: For those claiming partisanship, Hoosier  conservative & our former GOP Senator Dan Coats—now Director of National Intelligence—responded to @realDonaldTrump that Russia meddled in the ‘16 election & continues to meddle today. These are facts-not politics. https://t.co/659PDVeXIz

name: André Carson
tweet_text: 'Never before have we seen a president so dramatically set aside a vital American interest to appease the expectations of a foreign adversary.' My full statement on the #HelsinkiSummit here-> https://t.co/aZ2dpe04pY

name: André Carson
tweet_text:
(4/4) This not how a President acts. He is abandoning American interests to protect Russia. It's time for Congressional Republicans to stand on the side of
evidence.

name: André Carson
tweet_text: (3/4) The evidence is indisputable—the Russians interfered. And, now they admit they wanted Trump to win. @realdonaldtrump was elected to defend our democracy. Instead he believes Putin’s denial over abundant evidence presented by non-partisan American intelligence analysts.

name: André Carson
tweet_text:
(2/4) As Putin reminded us, he is a former KGB officer.
He won’t admit to an attack on our democracy just because the President asks.
We must follow the evidence. We can't let the President or politics disrupt
ongoing investigations.

name: André Carson
tweet_text:
(1/4) Today’s summit between President Trump & Putin
was shocking. @realDonaldTrump refused to condemn Russian interference, instead blaming American victims. This isn’t just rhetoric. Its abandoning our
interests.

name: André Carson
tweet_text: (2/2) It’s more clear than ever that @RealDonaldTrump should be holding President Putin accountable, not trying to strengthen relations w/ Russia at the expense of our allies.

name: André Carson
tweet_text: (1/2) Today’s indictment proves what Democrats have been saying for months: that the Russian government directly interfered in the 2016 election & continues to undermine our democracy today.
